long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Age of War Rush Game: A wild sprint of the primitive!

Welcome to "Age of War Rush Game"! In this thrilling running game, you will play as a brave primitive, traversing an ancient and dangerous world, collecting weapons and eliminating enemies.

Key Features:

Exciting sprinting experience: The game features 3D graphics that showcase the primitive's thrilling journey. You need to swiftly run while avoiding various obstacles and traps, performing jumps, slides, and dodges to maintain your life and speed.

Diverse weapon collection: In the game, you can collect various powerful primitive weapons such as stone axes, spears, and slingshots. Each weapon has a unique attack style and special abilities that can help you gain an advantage in battles.

Intense enemy battles: During your sprint, you will encounter dangerous enemies such as dinosaurs, beasts, and other primitives. Utilize the weapons you've collected to engage in battles and eliminate enemies, protecting your life and clearing your path.

Parkour competition mode: In addition to the main sprinting adventure mode, the game also offers a parkour competition mode where you can compete with other players. Compete for the top spot on the leaderboard by showcasing your speed and skills, demonstrating your primitive sprinting abilities.

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
